duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspect jobs in process and at completion to ensure standards of workmanship and safety are maintained.
Schedule and oversee subcontractors and laborers.
Obtain all permits and order required building materials.
Schedule required building inspections and pre-settlement inspections.
Manage individuals and groups, optimize performance of people, allocate tasks, provide effective feedback, and participate in formal processes.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 3 years of related experience in scheduling, ordering, field supervision, quality control, and production of all phases of residential construction. Thorough knowledge of all trades. Valid driver’s license and clean driving record. Knowledge of BuildPro preferred.
